short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ReadLater extension allows easy webpage saving for later. Right-click to add, view saved list, and resume browsing with a click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a read later button to the pop-up menu of right-clicking on a web page to close the current web page and collect it. Click the plug-in button in the upper right corner to display the list to be read later, display the title of the favorite web page and the web page screenshots. Click on the web page screenshot inside to restore the web page to the browser.
